intro: Aubletia laevis, commonly known as the smooth aubletia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. Aubletia laevis is adapted to arid environments and has a slow growth rate. Its leaves are simple and often have a hairy texture, contributing to its ability to retain moisture.
